title: Reason for change in energy consumption up to 1850

content.question: Which of the following best explains the change in energy consumption in the time period from 1000 to 1850 C.E.?

choices.label: The increasing mechanization of labor as a result of industrialization
The development of command economies during the second industrial revolution
The expansion of coerced labor in the Americas
The global intensification of peasant labor

content.answer: The increasing mechanization of labor as a result of industrialization

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
